document.full_text: supporters of a no-fly zone to halt libyan government air strikes on rebels circulated a draft resolution at the u.n. security council on tuesday that would authorize one, but other states said questions remained.
document.title: libya no-fly zone draft resolution circulated at u.n.
lines_and_colors: supporters of a no-fly zone to halt libyan government air strikes on rebels circulated a draft resolution at the u.n. security council on tuesday that would authorize one, but other states said questions remained.
